data.title: Torches (Las antorchas)
data.meta_description: Torches (Las antorchas), Leopoldo Méndez (Mexico, Mexico City, 1902-1969)  La Estampa Mexicana (Mexico, Mexico City), Mexico, Mexico City, 1947, published 1948, Prints, Linocut, <P>This linocut belongs to a suite of ten prints that Leopoldo Méndez created for the film <I>Río Escondido</I> (<I>Hidden River</I>), directed by Emilio Fernández (1904–1986) and shot by Gabriel Figueroa (1907–1997)—two greats of the Golden Age of Mexican cinema.
